name: Bravada
slogan: On Demand Marketing. Start-up, performance marketing and digital strategy specialists
description:
Bravada can help take your business to the next level.  Scrap DIY marketing, we’ve spent years testing what works and what doesn’t, so you don’t have to. 

We provide flexible, on-demand marketing services tailored to your business needs. Focused on Return on Investment, we don't just tell you we'll show you.

Our services include: Marketing Strategy, Paid performance marketing, Data, analytics and insights, Comms & Branding, Pitch Deck creation and Training & Mentoring

 We have over 15 years marketing experience with brands such as Amazon, Adidas, and a range of successful startups. The focus at Bravada is on execution, we will put in the building blocks to get your business to the next stage and grow key marketing metrics.

We have helped diverse clients, ranging from B2C apps, fin-tech businesses, gaming companies and restaurants boost Key Metrics, from revenue, downloads to new leads.

team.title: Director, Growth Specialist
team.name: Narada McKoy
team.bioHtml: Marketing specialist experienced in driving revenue growth and digital strategy for a wide range of businesses including amazon and successful start-ups.

jobs.title: Growth Marketing Manager
jobs.description:
Bravada "On Demand marketing" are looking for a passionate, eager to learn growth marketeer, to help scale the business.

You will work with the Founder on client projects, ranging from digital strategy formulation to performance marketing execution with businesses ranging from tech startups to established brands. 

Experience with Facebook Business Manager (ads), Google Ads, Google Analytics and high proficiency in written English is essential. 

Client facing experience, copywriting skills, design (canva/ photoshop), basic web development (Wordpress/ Javascript) would be highly desirable but not required.

Why work with us? You will have the opportunity to be one of the early members of a high growth start-up changing the face of marketing with the on-demand model. We supercharge business growth with clients including  tech startups, charities, established brands and restaurants, no two clients are the same and no two days will be. days will be the same

You will have the opportunity to work with directly with the Founder, a digital marketing expert with over 10 years experience, in startups and large businesses including Amazon to adidas. Learn and grow within the startup ecosystem with our flexible, co-working, autonomy driven environment and grow your entrepreneurial skills with Bravada.

Role will be contracted on a day rate to start, role will be 50% Remote and 50% onsite - with weekly client and team meetings in London.
